name: Geneviève Godbout
bio:
Freelance illustrator living in Montreal
〰️ Pastels and color pencils
Literary agent: @emily_van_beek

social_posts.post_text:
Here’s a sneak peak of my little Malou in wool felt created by @thegentlemanfelter.
It’s still a work in progress (soon he will have his yellow dungarees on). 
If you don’t know Simon’s work, run to his page. It’s pure MAGIC. I can’t help but see his little characters move. 
 
I feel incredibly lucky that he would agree to take on this little side project. Thank you, Simon, for bringing to life Malou ! 💛

We are proud to be part of @gallerynucleus current show in Los Angeles: DUO, a group exhibition. 

We were paired together to create original artwork that share a common theme (in our case, arctic), alongside many great artists. 

Each piece is available for individual purchase (though they look great paired together) ! 
Part of the proceeds will support Rainforest Alliance, an extremely worthwhile organization that protects biodiversity within endangered forest habitats and strives to build sustainable communities. 

The show is on until February 26th. And if you are not in LA, you can still see all the original pieces online.

#nucleusgallery #artforsale #rainforestalliance #arctic #illustration #exhibition #colouredpencils #gouache #pastels

I don’t care about Valentine’s Day. I am a firm believer that everyday should be important enough to give love to your friends and family (and other half if you have one). But hey, since I’m trying to be more regular at posting here, let’s play the social media game. 
Here’s a drawing I did 5 years ago of my love, Clément. Who since then gave me the most beautiful gift I could ever dream of: our little daughter Cléo. 
Love to you all on Valentine’s Day. And don’t forget to treat yourself with flowers or chocolates or whatever else today. 💋

« Mama bears »
My contribution to @gallerynucleus current show is available for sale.

#originalart #pastels #colorpencil
The Duo exhibition ends this Sunday at @gallerynucleus. My piece is still available to purchase in case you are interested ! ☺️✨

Il y a quelques semaines, j’ai eu le bonheur de visiter l’école primaire Charles LeMoyne à Montréal dans le cadre de la semaine de la lecture. Ces rencontres me font réalisé une fois de plus le travail extraordinairement dévoué des enseignant(e)s et l’importance de la littérature jeunesse dans les écoles. 
Nous avons discuté de différence, d’enjeux, d’entraide et de l’importance de donner de l’amour à son prochain. 
C’était ma première activité auprès des enfants depuis la pandémie et je sais déjà que ce sera le début d’une longue série !
〰️
A few weeks ago, I had the pleasure of visiting Charles LeMoyne Elementary School in Montreal as part of their Reading Week.
It made me realize once again the extraordinarily dedicated work of teachers and the importance of children's literature in schools.
We discussed difference, mutual aid and the importance of giving love to others.
It was my first activity with children since the pandemic and I already know that it will be the start of a long series !

I forgot to tell you that Gallery Nucleus (@gallerynucleus) is having a spring art sale! You can get 20% off with the code THANKS20 at checkout. The sale is on until April 4th, so don't miss your chance!

Hello Instagram followers! 
Are you still there? 😅
If so, thank you for bearing with me while I posted inconsistently these past 2 years. I had the most wonderful time being pregnant and looking after my precious little daughter, Cléo. But little did I know that this beautiful life change would be so transformative in my artistic approach too! 
Since I came back from maternity leave, I worked on various personal projects that inspire me greatly. I chose to stay discreet but soon I will share a LOT of new content. And yes, new picture books are in the making too!

But FIRST, let me show you this wool felted Malou created by the most talented @thegentlemanfelter.
Isn’t he precious ? 

Simon is a magician. Everything he does look somehow « real ». Also, is it just me or that would make the cutest character in stop motion animation (anyone??)? 
If it’s not the case already, I invite you to follow his work.

Stay tuned, I’m back for real, I promise. 🙃

Sneak peek of my upcoming book with the wonderful Dawn Casey (the author of Apple Cake). 
To be published by @quartokids @ivykidsbooks

A couple of weeks ago, I illustrated the birth announcement card of a sweet little girl born in the Netherlands. 🌷
I’m done with family portraits for good, but I might be open to do some creative requests of the kind this Fall. Stay tuned ! 🙃

I didn’t manage to post as consistently as I wanted to ever since I came back from maternity. 
And each time I was about to post something, I was questioning wether it was relevant to do so in times of climate change, war and sufferings. 
To be honest, I don’t have the answer to that yet. Some say we should connect with beauty in order to keep going. And I guess making books is all about celebrating the beauty of life, so that children can dream, and learn to make this world a better place. 

With that in mind, let me share a second sneak peek of my upcoming book with the talented English author Dawn Casey (Apple Cake). 
My Friend Tree is the story of a girl, a boy, and their friend the old oak tree that brings them together. 
I’m also very proud to have collaborated with @ivykidsbooks, a subdivision of @quartokids that creates sustainable printed books. 
This book is locally printed in the UK and in the USA on 100% post-consumer recycled paper. 
Thank you Georgia Buckthorn, Karissa Santos, Sasha Moxon and my dear agent @emily_van_beek for your infinite patience. 

Expect this book to hit your local bookstore at some point next Spring ! 🌱

L’écrivaine @leblancperrine m’a contactée en février 2022 pour me présenter un projet de livre. Voici enfin un aperçu de cette folie gardée secrète jusqu’à aujourd’hui. 
Le résultat, deux ans plus tard, c’est Petite Nature : 192 pages et 23 illustrations inédites. 

Souvenirs, courts récits de voyage, recettes, déclarations d’amour, secrets dévoilés, éclats du quotidien en Gaspésie, rituels, la mer et le bois mis en mots, Perrine fait dans Petite Nature l’inventaire de ses alliés du quotidien. Ces alliés que j'ai illustrés sont des lieux (voire une époque), des végétaux (fleurs, arbres, aromates, plantes adventices), des pierres fines, des pratiques artistiques, des animaux, une attitude, des cours d’eau puissants qui, à leur façon, peuvent nous aider à traverser les jours gris et les nuits sans lune.

J’ai eu envie d’explorer une approche complètement différente, plus féminine et moins enfantine, toujours aux pastels doux et aux crayons de couleur. 

Le livre sera disponible en prévente en décembre. Pour en savoir plus, cliquez sur le lien sur mon profil. 💫

Voici Chats: une des 23 illustrations qui accompagneront les textes de Perrine Leblanc dans Petite Nature. 
Cette collaboration s’est faite dans la grâce, la liberté et le partage. J’ai vibré profondément avec les textes de mon amie, qui m’ont inspiré une approche complètement nouvelle au dessin.
Nous avons hâte de vous en montrer plus.

Pour plus d’informations sur Petite Nature, visitez le lien sur mon profil.

Voici les pages d’introduction et la table des matières de PETITE NATURE (textes de @leblancperrine), ainsi que la maquette de la couverture préparée par les gars de @criterium_design ! 
L’imprimeur a reçu la toile, et les pros de l’estampage passeront à l’action en janvier. Les caractéristiques du tirage, et le prix sont maintenant sur mon site (cliquez le lien sur mon profil). 
En espérant que vous aimerez ce petit bijou de livre autant que nous. 🥰

Restez à l’affût, les préventes ouvrent ce lundi ! Il s’agit d’une édition très limitée à 200 exemplaires. ✨

Vous pouvez maintenant acheter votre exemplaire de PETITE NATURE (lien vers la boutique éphémère sur mon profil). 
*Prévente en cours jusqu'au 25 janvier 2024, date de disponibilité des exemplaires.*
.
You can now buy your copy of PETITE NATURE (link to the ephemeral store on my profile). 
*Pre-sales are ongoing until January 25 2024, when copies will be available.

Dévoilement d’une autre illustration réalisée pour PETITE NATURE, avec l’autrice @leblancperrine.
Inconsciemment, j’ai fait ce portrait qui nous ressemble un peu à toutes les deux. ➿
.
Unveiling of another illustration for PETITE NATURE, with author @leblancperrine.
Unconsciously, I made this portrait which looks a little like the two of us. ➿

Happy Winter Solstice !
.
My Friend Tree, by the wonderful Dawn Casey, will be published this Spring by @ivykidsbooks @quartokids
.
Une version francophone est aussi prévue aux @editionspasteque !
